definitions.definition: The humanistic study of texts and their languages , especially ancient or classical languages.

definitions.label_groups: especially Commonwealth , rare and somewhat archaic

definitions.definition: Love and study of learning and literature , broadly speaking.

main_definition: ( especially US ) The humanistic study of texts and their languages , especially ancient or classical languages.
secondary_definitions: ( especially Commonwealth , rare and somewhat archaic ) Historical or comparative linguistics .
( philosophy , rare ) Love and study of learning and literature , broadly speaking.
